titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the ministers of the counties of Suffolke and Essex, concerning church-government. Presented to the Right Honourable the House of Peers on Fryday, May 29. 1646. With their answer thereunto. Die Veneris, 29 Maii, 1646. Ordered by the Lords assembled in Parliament, that this petition and answer be forthwith printed and published. Jo. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Lords.
England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.

titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the ministers of the counties of Suffolke and Essex, concerning church-government. Presented to the Right Honourable the House of Peers on Fryday, May 29. 1646. With their answer thereunto. Die Veneris, 29 Maii, 1646. Ordered by the Lords assembled in Parliament, that this petition and answer be forthwith printed and published. Jo. Brown Cler. Parliamentorum.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Wright at the Kings Head in the Old Bayley.,

notesStmt.note: Includes: The answer of the House of Commons to the ministers petition. Die Mercurii 27 Maii. 1646.
In favor of Presbyterianism and against toleration--Thomason Catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
